ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990-PF WAS FILED ON NOVEMBER 15, 2023. HOWEVER, THE FILE WAS REJECTED. THE IRS WAS ABLE TO RESOLVE THE MATTER ON DECEMBER 20, 2023. THE FILE WAS THEN UPLOAD AND TRANSMITTED.
